template.name: Template Module Infinet AQUAMINT-MIB SNMPv2
template.description: AQUAMINT-MIB: The mib module for MINT (Infinet Wireless proprietary protocol).

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: RX bitrate (Kb/s)
item_prototype.description: Current RX bitrate in Kb/s

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: TX bitrate (Kb/s)
item_prototype.description: Current TX bitrate in Kb/s

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: RX load (pps)
item_prototype.description: Current RX link load from the neighbor in PPS

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: TX load (pps)
item_prototype.description: Current TX link load to the neighbor in PPS

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: RX load (Kbit/s)
item_prototype.description: Current RX link load from the neighbor in Kbit/s

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: TX load (Kbit/s)
item_prototype.description: Current TX link load to the neighbor in Kbit/s

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: RX power (tenth dBm)
item_prototype.description: Remote side current transmit power in tenth of dBm.

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: TX power (tenth dBm)
item_prototype.description: Current transmit power in tenth of dBm.

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Errors RX (%)
item_prototype.description: Remote Side transmit errors percent

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Errors TX (%)
item_prototype.description: Transmit errors percent.

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: RX Bytes
item_prototype.description: Input bytes number from the neighbor

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: RX packets
item_prototype.description: Input packets number from the neighbor

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Link distance (meters)
item_prototype.description: Link distance in meters.

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Link distance (km)
item_prototype.description: Link distance in Km.

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: TX Bytes
item_prototype.description: Output bytes number to the neighbor

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: TX packets
item_prototype.description: Output packets number to the neighbor

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Retries RX (%)
item_prototype.description: Remote Side transmit retries percent

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Retries TX (%)
item_prototype.description: Transmit retries percent.

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Link RSSI (dBm)
item_prototype.description: Link RX RSSI in dBm

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Input signal (dB)
item_prototype.description: Input signal level in dB for current RX bitrate

item_prototype.name: Link to "{#LINK_NAME}" [ $1 ]: Output signal (dB)
item_prototype.description: Output signal level in dB for current TX bitrate

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ $2 ] [ $1 ]: MINT links count
item_prototype.description: The parameter represents current number of neighbors

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ $2 ] [ $1 ]: Node ID
item_prototype.description: Node identification number

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ $2 ] [ $1 ]: Node mode
item_prototype.description: Node mode - fixed, nomadic or mobile

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ $2 ] [ $1 ]: Node type
item_prototype.description: Node type - master, mesh or slave

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ $2 ] [ $1 ]: Noise floor
item_prototype.description: The current noise floor in dBm.

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ {#IFDESCR} ] [ {#NET_ADDRESS} ]: Polling state
item_prototype.description: State of polling mechanism. On - polling is on, off - polling is off

item_prototype.name: "{#NODE_NAME}" [ $2 ] [ $1 ]: Roaming state
item_prototype.description: Current roaming state

template.name: Template Module Infinet AQUARADIO-MIB SNMPv2
template.description: AQUARADIO-MIB: The mib module for Revolution radio modules. Based on IEEE802dot11 mib module.

item_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Bandwidth
item_prototype.description: Current radio channel size in KHz.

item_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Bitrate
item_prototype.description: This value indicates radiomodule's current bitrate in kbits per second.

item_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Power level
item_prototype.description: This value indicates radiomodule's power output level (tenth dBm).

item_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Frequency
item_prototype.description: This value indicates radiomodule's operating frequency in KHz.

item_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Power control
item_prototype.description: "This value indicates whether automatic power control mode is turned on or off.

item_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Hardware type
item_prototype.description: Radiomodule type.

trigger_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Bitrate changed
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Bitrate has been changed.

trigger_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR}: Frequency changed
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Frrequency has been changed.

template.name: Template Net Infinet R5000 SNMPv2
template.description: Temaplate Net Infinet R5000: MIBs used: AQUASYSTEM-MIB SNMPv2-MIB

item.name: CPU Utilization
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysCpu This value indicates current CPU load rate in per cent

item.name: CPU Utilization ($1 s)
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysCpu This value indicates current CPU load rate in per cent

item.name: CPU Utilization ($1 s)
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysCpu This value indicates current CPU load rate in per cent

item.name: CPU Utilization ($1 s)
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysCpu This value indicates current CPU load rate in per cent

item.name: CPU Utilization ($1 s)
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysCpu This value indicates current CPU load rate in per cent

item.name: Hardware Location (GPS: long lat)
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysGPSXY Geographical coordinates of the unit (longitude and latitude) in degrees. This parameter is used for automatic tweaking of radio module parameters.

item.name: Hardware model
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysModel PN field from License.

item.name: Hardware serial number
item.description: MIB: AQUASYSTEM-MIB::sysSerialNumberStr This value indicates device's serial number as character string.

trigger.expression: {Template Net Infinet R5000 SNMPv2:infinet.sysSerialNumberStr.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Infinet R5000 SNMPv2:infinet.sysSerialNumberStr.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close
